title: Dazzlingly

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Redirect two players to you each night.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You will attack and clean anyone who visits you at night.
- On full moon nights, your attacks are Overkill.
- If your claim your role or a situation arises in which it's extremely obvious you're your role, you die and lose the game.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Kill at least three players, and survive until there's five or less players remaining.

desc:
